<script type="text/javascript">
    var AdsUtilities = function() {
        this.screenSizes = {
            'sm': [0, 767],
            'md': [768, 1023],
            'lg': [1024, 1199],
            'xlg': [1200, 99999]
        };
        this.platform = this.detectPlatform(window.innerWidth);
        this.debug("Detected platform: " + this.platform);

        this.configuredSlots = [];
    };

    AdsUtilities.prototype.detectPlatform = function(width) {
        for (platform in this.screenSizes) {
            var range = this.screenSizes[platform];

            if (width >= range[0] && width <= range[1]) {
                return platform;
            }
        }

        return 'lg';
    };

    AdsUtilities.prototype.debug = function() {
        var isDebug = location.search.search('ads_debug') >= 0;
        if (isDebug) console.debug.apply(console, arguments);
    };

    AdsUtilities.prototype.aditionConfigureSlot = function(api, conf) {
        api.configureRenderSlot(conf.slot).setContentunitId(conf.contentId).setRenderer("inline");
        this.configuredSlots.push(conf.slot);
        this.debug('Configuring slot "' + conf.slot + '" ('+ conf.contentId +')');
    };

    AdsUtilities.prototype.aditionConfigureVideoSlot = function(api, conf) {
        this.debug('Configuring slot "' + conf.slot + '" ('+ conf.contentId +')');
        this.videoContentId = conf.contentId;
    };

    AdsUtilities.prototype.aditionRenderSlot = function(slotId) {
        if (typeof adition !== 'undefined') {
            var configured = this.configuredSlots.indexOf(slotId) >= 0;
            if (configured) {
                adition.srq.push(function(api) {
                    api.renderSlot(slotId);
                });
                this.debug('[OK] Rendering slot "' + slotId + '"');
            } else {
                this.debug('[WA] Not rendering slot "' + slotId + '", not configured.');
            }

        } else {
            this.debug('Adition object not available!');
        }
    };

    AdsUtilities.prototype.getKeywords = function() {
        var metaKeywords = $('meta[name=keywords]').attr('content');

        var profileKeywords;
        if (typeof metaKeywords !== 'undefined') {
           profileKeywords = ',' + AdsUtilities.mapReplace(metaKeywords, {
               ' ': '_',
               '#': '_',
               'š': 's',
               'Š': 'S',
               'č': 'c',
               'Č': 'C',
               'ć': 'c',
               'Ć': 'C',
               'ž': 'z',
               'Ž': 'Z',
               'Đ': 'D',
               'ü': 'u',
               'Ü': 'U',
               'ö': 'o',
               'Ö': 'O',
               'ä': 'a',
               'Ä': 'A',
               '&': '_',
               '%': '_',
               '€': 'eur',
               '@': 'at',
               '!': '_',
               '__': '_',
               ',_': ',',
               '_,': ','
           }) + ',';
        } else {
            profileKeywords = '';
        }

        return profileKeywords.substring(0, 255);
    };

    AdsUtilities.prototype.getVideoTag = function(slot, playerId) {
        var url = document.location.pathname;
        var adtc = "true";
        if (!cca.cookieAllowAdvertising()) adtc = "false";
        /*
        var nugg = "";
        if (typeof nuggprof !== "undefined" && nuggprof !== "") {
            nugg = '&' + nuggprof;
        }*/
        var protocol = (document.location.protocol === "https:" ? "https:" : "http:");
        // var template = protocol + "//ad3.adfarm1.adition.com/banner?sid={zoneID}&wpt=X&prf[KEYWORD]={keywords}&prf[article]={url_of_the_article}{nugg}&prf[WW]={ww}&prf[CAT]={cat}&prf[AllowsCookies]={adtc}&kw={playerID}";
        
            var template = protocol + "//ad3.adfarm1.adition.com/banner?sid={zoneID}&wpt=X&prf[KEYWORD]={keywords}&prf[article]={url_of_the_article}&prf[WW]={ww}&prf[CAT]={cat}&prf[AllowsCookies]={adtc}&kw={playerID}";
        
        if (this.videoContentId) {
            template = AdsUtilities.mapReplace(template, {
                '{zoneID}': this.videoContentId,
                '{keywords}': encodeURIComponent(this.getKeywords()).replace(/%/g, "_"),
                '{url_of_the_article}': encodeURIComponent(url),
                // '{nugg}': nugg,
                '{ww}': window.innerWidth,
                '{cat}': AdsUtilities.getCategories(),
                '{adtc}': adtc,
                
                '{playerID}': playerId
            });
            return template;
        }
        return '';
    };

    AdsUtilities.mapReplace = function(str, obj) {
        var output = str;
        for (var key in obj) {
            output = output.replace(RegExp(key, 'g'), obj[key]);
        }
        return output;
    };

    AdsUtilities.getCategories = function() {
        
            var categories = 'trendi/svet\u002Dznanih__trendi';
        

        return encodeURIComponent(AdsUtilities.mapReplace(categories, {
            '/': '_'
        }));
    };

    var _ads = new AdsUtilities();

    var aditionMode = "sync";

    // Setup the callback queue
    var adition = adition || {}; adition.srq = adition.srq || [];

    if (aditionMode == "sync") {
        /* loading sync library */

    /* configuration */

    adition.srq.push(function(api) {
        api.registerAdfarm("ad3.adfarm1.adition.com");

        var adt_cookie = "true";
        if (!cca.cookieAllowAdvertising()) adt_cookie = "false";

        api.setProfile("AllowsCookies", adt_cookie).setProfile("WW","" + window.innerWidth);
        

        var adtRf = 'false';
        if(document.location.href == document.referrer)
            adtRf = 'true';
        api.setProfile("REFRESH", adtRf);

        /* setting keywords */
        var profileKeywords = _ads.getKeywords();

        if (profileKeywords) {
            api.setProfile("KEYWORD", encodeURIComponent(profileKeywords).replace(/%/g, "_"));
        }
        /*
        if (typeof nuggprof !== "undefined" && nuggprof !== "") {
            var ngg = nuggprof.replace(/prf\[/g, "").replace(/\]/g, "").split("&");
            for(i=0;i<ngg.length;i++) {
                prf = ngg[i].split("=");
                api.setProfile(prf[0], prf[1]);
            }
        }
        */

        api.setProfile("CAT", AdsUtilities.getCategories());
        api.setProfile("TYPE", encodeURIComponent("Article"));
        api.setProfile("URL", encodeURIComponent(window.location.href.replace(window.location.origin + '/', '').replace(/\/|\?|=|#|&/g, '_')).replace(/%/g, "_").replace(/__/g, "_").substring(0, 255));
        api.setProfile("PARAMS", encodeURIComponent(window.location.search.substring(1).replace(/\/|\?|=|#|&/g, '_')).replace(/%/g, "_").replace(/__/g, "_").substring(0, 255));

        
            api.setProfile("TopVideo", "false");
        

        /* configuring slots*/
        
        if (_ads.platform == 'sm') {
            _ads.aditionConfigureSlot(api, {
                'slot': 'aditionAds_rectangleMiddle',
                'contentId': 2990438,
            });
            _ads.aditionConfigureSlot(api, {
                'slot': 'aditionAds_rectangleBottom',
                'contentId': 2990606,
            });
            _ads.aditionConfigureSlot(api, {
                'slot': 'aditionAds_articleBottom',
                'contentId': 3879647,
            });
            _ads.aditionConfigureSlot(api, {
                'slot': 'aditionAds_mobileBillboard',
                'contentId': 4793403,
            });
            
        }
        
        if (_ads.platform == 'md') {
            _ads.aditionConfigureSlot(api, {
                'slot': 'aditionAds_leaderboardTop',
                'contentId': 3429579,
            });
            _ads.aditionConfigureSlot(api, {
                'slot': 'aditionAds_articleBottom',
                'contentId': 3879647,
            });
            _ads.aditionConfigureSlot(api, {
                'slot': 'aditionAds_inreadVideo',
                'contentId': 4280732,
            });
            
        }
        
        if (_ads.platform == 'lg') {
            _ads.aditionConfigureSlot(api, {
                'slot': 'aditionAds_billboardTop',
                'contentId': 2807898,
            });
            _ads.aditionConfigureSlot(api, {
                'slot': 'aditionAds_articleBottom',
                'contentId': 3879647,
            });
            _ads.aditionConfigureSlot(api, {
                'slot': 'aditionAds_inreadVideo',
                'contentId': 4280732,
            });
            
        }
        
        if (_ads.platform == 'xlg') {
            _ads.aditionConfigureSlot(api, {
                'slot': 'aditionAds_billboardTop',
                'contentId': 2807898,
            });
            _ads.aditionConfigureSlot(api, {
                'slot': 'aditionAds_halfRectTop',
                'contentId': 2807893,
            });
            if (window.innerWidth >= 1500) { 
            _ads.aditionConfigureSlot(api, {
                'slot': 'aditionAds_background',
                'contentId': 2807894,
            });
            }
            _ads.aditionConfigureSlot(api, {

                'contentId': 3879647,
            });
            _ads.aditionConfigureSlot(api, {
                'slot': 'aditionAds_inreadVideo',

        api.loadNow().completeRendering();

                        <div class="article__intro js_articleIntro">
                            <p>Španska prestolonaslednica Leonor bo avgusta začela triletno vojaško usposabljanje, je sporočila španska obrambna ministrica. Princesa bo prihodnje šolsko leto obiskovala splošno vojaško akademijo v mestu Zaragoza, nato bo eno leto v pomorski šoli v Galiciji, zatem pa še leto dni na letalski akademiji v regiji Murcia.</p>
                        </div><div class="js_bannerInArticle  article__banner cf">
                                <div id="aditionAds_inreadVideo">
    <script type="text/javascript">
        if (typeof _ads !== "undefined") _ads.aditionRenderSlot("aditionAds_inreadVideo");
    </script>
</div>

                            </div>

                        <div class="banner banner__article">
                            <div id="aditionAds_rectangleMiddle">
    <script type="text/javascript">
        if (typeof _ads !== "undefined") _ads.aditionRenderSlot("aditionAds_rectangleMiddle");
    </script>
</div>

                        </div>

                        <div class="article__main js_article js_bannerInArticleWrap">
                            <p>Princesa <strong>Leonor</strong>, ki bo oktobra dopolnila 18 let, je prva v vrsti za španski prestol, druga je njena mlajša sestra <strong>Sofia</strong>, ta vrstni red pa bi se spremenil le, če bi njen oče, 55-letni španski kralj <strong>Filip VI.</strong>, dobil sina.</p>
<p>Ko oziroma če bo Leonor sedla na španski prestol, bo s tem postala tudi poveljnica španskih oboroženih sil, zato od nje pričakujejo, da bo vojaško usposobljena, je pojasnila španska obrambna ministrica <strong>Margarita Robles</strong>. "Poleg tega se v zadnjih letih trudimo, da bi v oborožene sile vključili več žensk," je dodala.</p>
<p><!-- renderer default_renderer for repository.image -->
<span class="article__figure ck_image_in_article ck_image_in_article--full">
<a class="imagelightbox" href="/media/img/2f/8f/c255dedd4f6251180582-princesa-leonor.jpeg"><span class="article__figure_wrap">
<img alt="Španski kralj Filip s hčerkama Leonor in Sofio ter ženo Letizio | Foto: Guliverimage" class="rspimg" data-lightbox-image-href="/media/img/2f/8f/c255dedd4f6251180582-princesa-leonor.jpeg" itemprop="image" src="/media/img/c4/dd/e7f46cd2fe17a598cae1-princesa-leonor.jpeg" title="princesa Leonor">
</span></a>
<span class="article__figure_caption has_divider cf">
<span class="article__figure_caption--description"> Španski kralj Filip s hčerkama Leonor in Sofio ter ženo Letizio </span>
<span class="article__figure_caption--author"> Foto: Guliverimage </span>
</span>
</span>
</p>
<p>Španska vlada se je zato s kraljevo hišo dogovorila, da bo princesa prestala "zelo intenzivno" vojaško urjenje, šele nato pa nadaljevala "civilno" izobraževanje. Po triletnem vojaškem usposabljanju bo najprej študirala na eni od univerz v Španiji, nato pa podiplomski študij nadaljevala v tujini. Enako je storil tudi njen oče, ki je po vojaškem urjenju študiral pravo v Madridu, nato pa magistriral iz mednarodnih odnosov v Washingtonu.</p>
<p>Španska monarhija se v zadnjih letih intenzivno trudi popraviti svojo podobo, ki jo je v zadnjih desetletjih skrhal niz škandalov, večinoma povezanih s Filipovim očetom, kraljem <strong>Juanom Carlosom</strong>. Ta je leta 2014 odstopil zaradi davčnega škandala, v katerega je bilo vpletenih tudi nekaj članov kraljeve družine, od leta 2020 pa živi v Abu Dabiju.</p>
<p><strong>Preberite še:</strong></p>
